website_summaries.verdict: An affordable and effective defrosting tray that doubles as a bacon cooker when placed in your microwave.
pros: Versatile, as this tray can be used to defrost food as well as make bacon in the microwave
Sloped design keeps water, juices, and grease away from food as it works
cons: Made of plastic, so it's not as durable as some competitors
Somewhat large, so it won't fit well in smaller microwaves

customer_reviews.title: NOT DISHWASHER SAFE
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to clean by hand washing because of the grooves, nooks and crannies. I soaked it over night with Dawn liquid. Still challenging to get it clean. I thought I could wash in dishwasher but wrapper states clearly it will be damaged if you use a dishwasher. It did cook bacon great though, just a bear to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Red

customer_reviews.title: cracked after 1 use
customer_reviews.text: I used this to cook my bacon in the microwave. I covered the bacon with a paper towel to prevent splattering. I let it cook and went to handwash it and I now have a chip that wasn't there when it arrived. The coating is bubbling up, there's the beginning of another crack in 2 other places. Apparently, it doesn't hold up well in the microwave and I would not recommend this product. This was my first time using the tray and already visible damage
customer_reviews.author: Durden Family

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this and when it arrived I was disappointed. The tray was dirty and looked as if it had been used already and returned. I ignored this and decided that I'd wash it and try it out. This takes forever to cook bacon! I bought this to save time but this did the opposite. It took over 10 mins to cook and was still not finished. I then cooked a piece of bacon on a paper plate and it crisped faster than the tray did. Would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: A well designed and manufactured microwave plate that performs as promised.
customer_reviews.text: After a couple decades my former microwave meat grill became cracked and dingy. Time for a new one. I didn't know it at the time but this Nordic Ware plate is the same one. So, assuming I take reasonable care of it, I expect to use it for years to come. It works as promised. I use it primarily for defrosting items and for cooking bacon. I usually put a section of paper towel on top when cooking bacon to absorb some of the grease. A well designed item made with good material, a type of plastic I think. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: M. OlesonTop Contributor: Game of Thrones

customer_reviews.title: Lets bacon fat drip off the bacon during cooking
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have bought of these, having cracked the last one after dropping it. I hate breaking it, the dog loved the outcome. Anyway, this one is easy to keep clean and use - just put the bacon on it, cover with a paper tower to absorb some of the grease splatter, and microwave. It comes clean with Dawn and water after some gentle scrubbing. It has been durable and does what it says. You can likely use it to warm or cook a burger or slim piece of fatty fish.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos T.

customer_reviews.title: It is defective and I don't recommend buying
customer_reviews.text: I have had this item for about 3 months but only used it twice... each time we use it the bacon doesn't cook evenly.. some pieces are burnt or not cooked at all. The tray burned on the very first use almost causing a fire in our microwave. I wanted to return my item and the window for return is "closed." I am very unhappy with this product. It is defective and I don't recommend buying
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: She is not pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: The first time my wife used it, it burnt in the middle and a small cracked formed in the middle. She is not pleased with it. She will not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: William Robbins Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for the bacon lover
customer_reviews.text: Works fairly well and cleans up easily. The tray is too big for me to have the microwave rotate the bacon, so some of the bacon gets more done than others. I could probably stop it mid-cook and rotate the tray 180 degrees and that might fix that, but it doesn't really bother me that much. This tray allows me to cook 6 strips of regular bacon in 5 minutes with basically no mess.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Borchardt

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and large enough for six slices.
customer_reviews.text: The new Nordic Ware microwave tray was exactly like the one we bought over 30 years ago. The old one finally developed a crack over the years. We liked it so much we replaced it with an exact duplicate. Its large enough for six slices of bacon.
customer_reviews.author: brcaslmn -Florence, OR

customer_reviews.title: not the same quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this piece of Nordic Ware three times since 2015, absolutely loved it until the last one I got earlier this year. When we got our place at the beach this was one of the first things I bought. Once I took the sleeve/packaging off it looked used (off color) It's not the same quality, it's lightweight by comparison and it's very difficult to clean, it stains. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Annesg

customer_reviews.title: Just like the old one
customer_reviews.text: Looks like this one might be a factory second or irregular. Maybe a return. It has the factory wrapper but one of the get is chipped and blackened. However our old one held up well for years and very happy we can replace it. For the other doubters we put a paper towel over and under the bacon. It holds up to six pieces without a problem. Cleanup is a snap with a bit of prep. Fifth star withheld based on condition.

customer_reviews.title: Good little microwave dish!

It's held up well considering the use it gets. Over time theirs became stained and it's moderately easy to clean.Also, the first one eventually got a little crack in it but is still well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is not as good as the older version of this product.
customer_reviews.text: My mother had tis produce , I believe it was in the middle to late 70's. It was great for cooking bacon. I saw this recently and purchased one. The first one arrived damaged in shipping. this one arrived in good shape. After a few times cooking bacon it has started to discolor in spots slightly and formed a couple minor bubble like defects. These have not affected it ability to cook bacon, yet. When my mother bought this item microwave ovens were not as powerful as they are today. I guess this could be the issue. My current microwave is 1200 watts hers was maybe 600 watts.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth L. Kendrick

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much useless for it's intended purpose!  Buy something else.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much useless for it's intended purpose! Very disappointed -- It didn't do the job in my Microwave. Now I'm using it beneath a plant. It does work for that. Ha! At least it's not a total "Cash in the Trash" waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Chessie

customer_reviews.title: Not for thick bacon
customer_reviews.text: It seems like this tray only wants to work for thinner bacon, and since I like thick bacon, it hasn’t worked the best for me. Even when I put the bacon in there on 30 second intervals, it still seems to burn spots on the bacon. Cleaning this is not necessarily the easiest, and unless you want bacon grease splattered ALL over your microwave, you have to make sure you cover it all up with paper towels.
customer_reviews.author: bmhnpb

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: The bacon tray is nice but smaller than I expected. I have to cut the bacon strips in half to cook them which means I can only cook 3 slices at a time. It would be okay if you are single but not for a family! I should have bought the round one like I had before. And the lid makes the bacon cook differently. The brand is good though.
customer_reviews.author: TexasT23

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one -- the first one lasted over 20 years and finally cracked, probably because I kept putting it in the bottom shelf of the dishwasher. (I'm putting this one on the top shelf, altho, at 83, I probably don't need to worry about it lasting 20 years). I usually freeze bacon in 2-slice packages and so put the frozen slices diagonally on this tray and microwave them.
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: Great microwave bacon cooker!
customer_reviews.text: I already had one of these microwave bacon cookers but wanted another one so I could make 2 batches at a time. My daughter wanted one because she likes how easy it is to cook bacon on these. I've have had the other one for years, they hold up very well, cooks the bacon nice & crispy, if that's how you like it, the grease falls into the well on the side...I spray cooking spray between each batch of bacon...makes clean up a breeze! I would definately recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Blondie

customer_reviews.title: Repeat Buy
customer_reviews.text: Have had one of these for years. It was finally showing its age so I replaced it, though I could have kept using it. It is a first-rate product. Perfect for cooking bacon.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Microwave Accessory
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first one years ago and have continued to buy as a gift for others. Cooking surface is 10 in. X 10 in. with a 2 inch drain area. I lay my bacon across the pan, not perpendicular to the drain. I like crispy bacon which sometimes sticks in a few places. Afterwards I pour very hot or boiling water over the Nordic pan with some dish soap and let it soak. I have a dollar flat plastic took that I use to scrap any of the tough spots and put through the dishwasher to cut the grease. Works for me. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Bismark Palm

customer_reviews.title: Essential kitchen tool

customer_reviews.author: William Laughlin

customer_reviews.title: Terrible

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again.

customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT DISHWASHER OR OVEN SAFE

customer_reviews.title: Works great

customer_reviews.title: Bacon anytime.

customer_reviews.title: Change it once a year!

customer_reviews.title: Got bacon?

It cooks the bacon very easily and because of the slanted tray all of the grease drains into the holding cup . She had one years ago but it had finally worn out and we had bought various different types of microwave bacon cooker’s but none were nearest good as this one
customer_reviews.author: Just my opinion

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My mom had one of these for years, I was excited to see this again. Love that the grease drains into the big slot. Cleans easily. I recommend, just be wary that you can only squeeze 6 slices without double stacking. Nordic Ware makes some awesome products.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Ransom

customer_reviews.title: Works very good....but get the lid!
customer_reviews.text: Works good with the lid. I used this to make two packages of bacon and could fit 4 slices, easily. It took about 4-5 minutes to get it crispy. It was easy but did take a bit of time. Cleaning this thing was a pain in the you-know-what! Seems like things permeated the plastic. I had to use a small brush (after soaking in soapy hot water for 20 minutes). I do think the clean-up of this plastic plate was worth NOT having to clean up grease splatters all over my stove area. I also think do to the porous nature of this product......that it'll only last so long and then have to be replaced. Thank you.

customer_reviews.title: BACON!
customer_reviews.text: We had one of these before and we lost it when we moved. I tried the round one for awhile, but we like this one much better and finally purchased another one. I cook 6 slices of bacon on it in the microwave for 6 mins. I don't recommend cooking more than 6 at a time. You may have to adjust the minutes depending on your microwave. I like mine crispy. I lay them crosswise. It seems to collect a lot more of the bacon grease in the tray which is easy to pour off into a container and save in the fridge for making gravy or adding to recipes.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ray

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Had a similar one purchased in the mid 80s and used until 2004 - finally had to give it up. Hadn't seen a replacement until just recently when searching on Amazon. Easy to use and only minutes for great bacon!

customer_reviews.title: TOO BIG.......

customer_reviews.title: Great product!

customer_reviews.title: Works just like my origanal one but not broken like my old one is!
customer_reviews.text: I like that it isn't broke and works just as good as my old one did before getting broke.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: This is a good product for its purpose.....
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two and one was received broken. I returned it for refund.... Having had a very similar product for many years, I expect this new one will be great.....
customer_reviews.author: Charles L. Ross Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Too large to allow turntable to turn in microwave
customer_reviews.text: Like the concept but it’s too big to allow the turntable to turn and cook evenly so it stops it from moving and then I have to flip and move around the bacon for more even cooking. Good in theory
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Cracked after a month
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used it a handful of times and it has a crack in it. So now bacon grease seeps thru the crack and gets my microwave dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Karlli

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: This is nice tray for bacon we put slices down a piece of paper towel or parchment paper then another couple slices can cook enough on the tray for a couple BLT’s it’s great !!
customer_reviews.author: Donnalar

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to use, and I can throw it in the dishwasher- I use it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Tesky

customer_reviews.title: A little difficult to wash, but that's the ONLY con!
customer_reviews.text: These plates are a great way to cook bacon in the microwave, along with the other product that I've reviewed, the product to cook eggs in the microwave. The ONLY CON is that it can be, sometimes, hard to clean. The key, so I've found, is to place the tray immediately in the sink after use, along with some dish soap (Dawn for me!) to cut the grease and make it easier to wash. Let it soak for a short while, rinse and, voilà, you're ready to go for the next round, next time.
customer_reviews.author: Scooter1968

customer_reviews.title: Round shape perfect for microwave
customer_reviews.text: I owned a rectangular bacon tray for a long time and almost every time I used it, I'd wonder why not make it round? Once it broke, I had to replace it and found this. I have not yet used the flat side, but have used the grooved side every weekend for several months to microwave bacon. I will not fry foods, especially bacon, indoors on the range due to the splatter and the smell, so I love this tray. It also makes cooking bacon effortless... Punch in a couple buttons on the microwave and done!
customer_reviews.author: kahvi79Top Contributor: DC Comics

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bacon.  Easy cleanup.
customer_reviews.text: Makes perfect bacon in a few minutes in the microwave oven. I put a small bit of paper towel over the bacon gently pressed atop the bacon. This contains any splatter while cooking. Then use the paper to easily clean the rack in the sink with a little hot water. The bacon is better than fried in a pan, not greasy but crisp and perfect for BLTs. Which I make open-faced in under 5 minutes with a slice of good toasted artisan bread.
customer_reviews.author: Froniga

customer_reviews.title: Does not work in rotating microwaves
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit in microwaves with rotating platforms. My microwave is fairly large with a rotating glass tray. I have bought 2 different bacon trays now designed for microwave use that were way to big to rotate while cooking. Most modern microwaves have this rotating platform.. disappointed this isn’t mentioned in their marketing info on the amazon page!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More bacon = real American
customer_reviews.text: Finally found the replacement for one we had a decade ago! One of the first and best designs. Who sells round bacon? It takes a geometry professor to get more than three pieces on those round microwave cooking trays. I wish they offered a square cover for this one, but I just use a single paper towel to cover the bacon and that works good enough. We used our first tray like this for probably twenty years and I don't know what happened to that original one, but I suppose this one will last as well. Buy it and start eating more bacon.
customer_reviews.author: Hoghead

customer_reviews.title: Does not do its job. Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: When I opened this & washed it, it was already greasy. Not sure if this product was already used or not, but it had a chip in the corner which had been glued in with a piece of plastic. I used it & when I pulled it out of the microwave it was saggy & the grease was coming down the sides. I have tried to wash it over & over, it stills feels greasy. Terrible product. I would like a full refund for this headache piece of garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have used. I gave my old one to my son. I put four pieces of bacon on it, cover it with a paper towel and microwave for approximately 3 minutes for great bacon.
customer_reviews.author: mach1one1

customer_reviews.title: These are great
customer_reviews.text: These are the greatest thing for cooking bacon - I put a paper towel down then strips of bacon then another paper towel. I like my bacon crisp so I time 1 minute per slice and this grill lets the bacon cook evenly and the paper towel absorbs the grease. Clean up is so easy. The other side to reheat things but the grill side is great for even cooking with baked potato's etc. Every happy with this grill - it's the second one I've owned as hubby dropped the first one and broke it but had it for over 8 years without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy M.

customer_reviews.title: OK, not great for pizza.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would heat up and keep the crust on pizza from getting soggy. Not so, it does not really warm up the way the metal microwave plates do. I thought it might be healthier not to be eating Teflon, but I think the metal plates do a better job. I'll probably switch back at some point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Microwave Bacon rack
customer_reviews.text: Getting a replacement rack because UPS managed to break the bubble wrapped rack during delivery. Replacement is handled with professionalism an promptness.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Frashier

customer_reviews.title: Burned
customer_reviews.text: The round design seemed more efficient for microwave use, although bacon had to be cut in half to make it fit on the tray. It showed signs of burning the second time out. Now in 2015, the middle ribs are entirely black and about half the height of the others. I use it only for bacon. The idea was good but needs to be made more heat/wave resistant. It also has absorbed the color of the bacon and/or the heat so it's more dark ivory than white.
customer_reviews.author: teal mn

customer_reviews.title: Great for cooking in an RV
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our RV and it is perfect in size and weight. I cook bacon, sausage, burgers, and other meats that need to drain fat. It holds up well to the heat generated by cooking in the microwave. I hand wash it while we are camping, but run it through the dishwasher with no problems when we get home.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Did someone say bacon?
customer_reviews.text: I love this and we r eating a lot of bacon now! Easy to use and clean. Cooks bacon well done for those that like extra crispy bacon! You must turn the bacon over during cooking to get ultimate crispness throughout and not burn!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great for saving paper towels
customer_reviews.text: Saves a lot of paper towels. These have been around about as long as microwaves but I never thought it would be very useful. I was wrong. I like bacon cooked in the microwafe. It gets rid of most of the fat, but if you cook it on a plate with paper towels you need a lot of them to soak up the grease. With this you just need to cover the raw bacon so the fat doesn't splater. It all stays in the ban. It's also easy to pour the grease out if you want to save it. Cleans up well in the dishwasher. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Great but a little hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: I've never been a fan of cooking bacon in the microwave... Until now. This thing works really good. It is nice if you are just making some soup or a salad and need a few pieces of bacon. It also doesn't make your entire house smell like bacon like it does when you cook it in a pan. It is very durable and ours is still in great condition after about 6 months of ownership and use. I will say that it is not the easiest thing to clean. We usually have to soak it in water to get all the staining off of it from the bacon grease.
customer_reviews.author: A Little Bit Of Everything

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd one of these I’ve had. Great for microwaving bacon. Become a little hard to clean but after very many uses. I use this always instead of messing frying in skillet.
customer_reviews.author: Laura L Huffman

customer_reviews.title: that one is still holding together and still works beautifully. It's getting harder to find well made things ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an identical Nordic Ware microwave bacon tray that was about 30 years old. Although its showing its age, that one is still holding together and still works beautifully. It's getting harder to find well made things anymore, as everything has gone cheap; but this is the exception. This new one is constructed exactly the same, so it should last for decades as well.
customer_reviews.author: at

customer_reviews.title: This is the one to get- forget the fancy gadgets
customer_reviews.text: Great bacon 🥓 tray. Replaces one that I had for 20 years- this is the one to get. Forget the fancy gadgets

customer_reviews.title: Small size
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than the old one that I had. Center cut bacon just fits, all other slices hang over the ends a bit. Not really happy with it.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the same microwave bacon tray for over 25 years and decided I should probably replace it with another Nordic Ware. The new one has a burn stain on it after one use. I even had a paper towel under the bacon. It is not anywhere near the same quality as its predecessor. Glad I kept the old one. Don’t waste your money on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Srae216

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy

It eliminated the smell that lingered after pan frying. That alone was a sheer pleasure, not to mention the no fat and the crispiness of the bacon. It is also easy to clean (a major concern since I hate to do dishes in the first place let alone fight with baked on stuff). It arrived on time and was well packaged. I don't know why I waited so long to order it.

customer_reviews.author: Lois McNicol

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for cooking bacon in the microwave. it is easy to clean and use.
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product. This makes cooking bacon easy and fast. It is also very easy to clean.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit standard microwaves.

customer_reviews.text: I had a square one that would turn in the microwave. This one works great.

customer_reviews.title: great microwave pan
customer_reviews.text: One of these came with my Wolf convection microwave and I love it. It gets used anytime I am reheating something and makes it easy to remove the reheated item from the microwave as it doesn't get as hot as the item being removed. I also use it for baking small items such as frozen biscuits with the convection bake setting. I love it so much I bought a second one because sometimes I find I am reheating something while prepping another item and had to wait for the pan. I have used it for cooking bacon and was happy with the results.

customer_reviews.title: Had one of these before and loved it....
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this microwave bacon tray for our RV and when it arrived it was broken in 4 pieces. i contacted Amazon and they overnighted me a new one! I love this bacon tray because you just put the bacon on, lay a napkin over the bacon and pop it into the microwave. bacon comes out crispy and fat drains down into the tray. Plus, I do not have to have grease splatters all over our new RV walls! Love it and would highly recommend this to RV owners or anyone that hates the greasy mess of frying bacon!

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Too big for medium sized ovens - I bought this pan and did not consider the diagonal measure relative to my microwave. My fault for not calculating that with help from Pythagoras. It fit inside the oven, but would not turn. I tried using it without the turntable spinning. The result was that the pan burnt on the first use. I threw it away. Only order this is you have a LARGE microwave.
customer_reviews.author: alexra denver

customer_reviews.title: This is a pretty great bacon cooker
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty great bacon cooker. The grease drips down into the basin, and you can pour it out from there. With some bacon you cannot lay the slices out from end to end without curling them up, it is not wide enough. The angle on the cooker should also be a little steeper so more of the grease drips down. Sometimes a lot remains on the upper portion. I have had to modify it so it is steeper.

The old one served well and I trust this one will, too. I like that it is rigid unlike some cheapies I tried and which not only spilled the grease but quckly cracked and broke.

customer_reviews.title: Good value and quality!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and very well made...keeps my microwave clean! Great Buy!
customer_reviews.author: Alice S.

customer_reviews.title: Great and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy-duty rack that can even stand up to a 400F oven according to the packaging. It's quite dense and thick so it doesn't warp, and holds 5 or 6 slices of bacon. The fins are tall enough that the bacon stays above any drippings (which are pretty voluminous for bacon), but spaced far enough apart that the tray is pretty easy to clean by hand afterwards; I usually just toss it in the dishwasher and it's fine there even on the bottom rack.
customer_reviews.author: Mondoman

customer_reviews.title: Nice price, nice plate.
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these but unfortunately threw it out with my old microwave when it broke. The plate was inside! So I bought this one. It's pretty much identical to the one I had. Works very well and cleans up nice. The one thing is you might want to buy a grill scrubbing sponge to clean the grill side. A George Foreman grill sponge works very well for that and it won't scratch the plate.

customer_reviews.text: Works great, i love bacon. i put it through the washer and its fine. the deep channels for the bacon grease help a bunch as well. i cook my bacon for 2-3 minutes (about 6 pieces) between paper towel and it turns out perfect every time. tray is a bit small, but there wasn't a larger one available at the time.
